treatment.description: Plants 10–30 cm. Stems ascending or erect, sometimes prostrate. Leaves: stipules 4.5–8 mm; blade 1.5–4 cm. Flowers: sepal lobes ovate to lanceolate, (4.5–)5–5.5 mm, to 7 mm in fruit; petals white, 1–1.3 times as long as sepals; styles 2–3 mm. Capsules 0.8–1 times as long as sepals. Seeds dark red-brown, often with submarginal groove, sub-orbiculate to pyriform, 0.8–1.2 mm, covered with rounded, elongate tubercles; wing sometimes absent, 0.2–0.3 mm wide.
